import React from 'react'; const AboutPartner = () => { const aboutCTGN = 'China Global Television Network (CGTN) is a global media organization providing international audiences with accurate and timely news coverage across all its media platforms with the goal of promoting communication and understanding while enhancing cultural exchange and building mutual trust between China and the world. Launched on December 31, 2016, CGTN and its Global Video News Agency are headquartered in Beijing with production centers in Nairobi, London, and Washington, DC. CGTN’s professionals are dedicated to delivering fair, diverse, and objective reporting to more than 160 countries and regions across the planet.'; const privacy = 'This webpage includes material produced by third parties over which National Geographic has no control.'; return (

CGTN

{aboutCTGN}

{privacy}

{/*contact us*/}

Connect with us

{privacy}

); }; export default AboutPartner;
